title: Too Many Options in Barca's Attack?
description:
The FC crew debate which of Barcelona's number of attackers are most likely to start now that Robert Lewandowski is on his way to the club. Plus, Bayern Munich reportedly reject bringing in Cristiano Ronaldo and Neymar is linked with a move to Manchester City, but does he have the work ethic to succeed under Pep Guardiola?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona's bevy of attacking talent gets richer with Lewandowski; Bayern reject Ronaldo; Neymar linked with Guardiola and Man City

Plus, Bayern Munich reportedly reject bringing in Cristiano Ronaldo and Neymar is linked with a move to Manchester City, but does he have the work ethic to succeed under Pep Guardiola?
